column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Use an Oekaki
#Text=Drawing on the computer is hard , but an oekaki ( doodling and painting program ) can make it more simple than it appears .
#Text=This can help you use an oekaki so you can stop using that horrible MS-Paint !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Find an oekaki that seems fitting to your level .
#Text=Go to draw , if that is what it is under .
#Text=Pick out which program you want to use .
#Text=Shi-painter is a tricky one , but in a way it 's easy .
#Text=In Shi-painter , you can have a rainbow of colors that you pick out , and you have a new tool called pen .
#Text=Pen makes it seem like a real pencil drawing .
#Text=If you get the hang out this , then try Shi-painter Pro .
#Text=If Shi-painter is n't for you , try PaintBBS .
#Text=Palette is good for it because it gives you more colors .
#Text=OekakiBBS is a good one , and it has a different way of sizing the point of the pen .
#Text=Usually , oekakiBBS wo n't allow you to submit your art , so I would avoid using this one .
#Text=Pick whatever one you want , and start sketching .
#Text=For sketching , use a different color other than black .
#Text=Such as , for the eyes use orange , or for the head use green .
#Text=Switch colors often so you will know where a part ends .
#Text=Now go over the lines with a darker color , or just use black .
#Text=Add detail .
#Text=Color using And or Div.
#Text=If you feel like you are finished send it .
#Text=Type out a comment about your drawing , and type out a title .
#Text=Ask for crits if you want to improve .
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you want to find an oekaki of your level , and are a beginner , go to an oekaki without try-outs .
#Text=Suta Raito Sketch oekaki is a good one , and so is EP oekaki .
#Text=If someone says such things as , ' Your art sucks !
#Text=' do n't let it get to you !
#Text=If you want ' crits ' then say so , but if you do n't say so too , because in a normal oekaki they WILL give crits .
#Text=The bezier tool helps !
#Text=Get your own style , so people notice you !
#Text=If you want help on your figure for drawing , ask for a redline .
#Text=Mask is good for going over lines in black .
#Text=And is good for coloring , and so on .
#Text=These are simple tools .
#Text=If you feel as though your drawing is n't great , then do n't send it !
#Text=But if you really want to do .
#Text=You can Safety save , or S.S. your unfinished works .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=If you are trying out for a normal or advanced oekaki and are just a beginner in oekakis , then you should wait , because they will crit you .
#Text=If you spam , you will have a warning .
#Text=Crits can be harsh !
#Text=Sometimes your drawing might close , so use PRT SCR ( print screen ) button often !
#Text=Your artwork might get bumped off quickly , so save it !
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=A computer .
#Text=A basic skill of drawing and coloring .
#Text=Internet .
#Text=Not needed , but helps : Tablet .
